issues_found: Gumbel-Softmax to hard argmax mismatch causes only 6 codes used at inference despite 125+ during training
CE loss plateaued at 6-8 throughout training, never converged to < 3.0
Compression ratio dropped below 5x target (4.91x vs 5.76x in Cycle 1)
Decoder mode collapsed to outputting high-frequency tokens ('the', ',', '.') regardless of input
